alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 5:07PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Routt and east central Moffat Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 507 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hayden, or 14 miles east of Craig, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Craig. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 91 and 114. Colorado 13 between mile markers 90 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin
